article_title: Kansas GOP senator denounces Brownback administration memo on Medicaid expansion, exposing a growing rift in the party
article_text:
Kansas state Sen. Jeff King issues newsletter condemning claims that Medicaid expansion is “morally reprehensible”

He suggests examination of expanding Medicaid through private insurers

NEW: Gov. Sam Brownback spokeswoman says original letter not aimed at any legislator

article_metadata.description: A Republican state senator in Kansas has blasted a memo from a spokeswoman for Gov. Sam Brownback that claimed expanding Medicaid in the state would be “morally reprehensible.”
article_metadata.title: Kansas GOP senator denounces Brownback administration memo on Medicaid expansion, exposing a growing rift in the party | The Kansas City Star
